name: WHERE IS THAT KITTY GOING???
description:
This Kitten hurries up! Where is he going? What will he have to deal with on his challenging journey?  Have a closer look at him and fall in love! Every 10 seconds Kitty has to deal with new challenges:
  • Jump more and more!
  • Oh no, the printer ran out of colored ink!
  • Why it’s so hard to see?
  • Suddenly, everything is so fast!
Programs we used:
  • Krita
  • MediBang Paint
  • Photoshop
  • Godot
Sadly, it doesn't work correctly if your Screen scale is set to >100%!

(For Windows users): Make sure that your screen scale is set to 100% in Settings -> System -> Display -> Scale and layout. We are working on that and sorry for inconvenience!

With love, for our first players <3!
